parameters.message: "Not really. I'm not feeling much like myself these days..."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe

parameters.message: "Oh well, ok then. You can stay here as long as you want, but you are also free to go."
parameters.name: Izumi

parameters.message: "And if you need any help, medical or not, feel free to come by!"
parameters.name: Izumi

parameters.message: "Thanks. I'll be leaving, just give some moments, please."
parameters.name: Hameru Tabe
